title: Smart Data Models - Pss5
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Italian PSS - Detailed PSS.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be Pss5

ctw2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Selector for Second washout enabling (C). true = second washout filter is bypassed false = second washout filter in use. Typical Value = true. Default: False

deadband.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Stabilizer output dead band (DeadBand).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

isfreq.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Selector for Frequency/shaft speed input (IsFreq). true = speed false = frequency. Typical Value = true. Default: False

kf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Frequency/shaft speed input gain (K).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0.0

kpe.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Electric power input gain (K).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0.0

kpss.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. PSS gain (K).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

pmm.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum power PSS enabling (P).  Typical Value = 0.25. Default: 0.0

tl1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead/lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tl2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead/lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tl3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead/lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tl4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Lead/lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tpe.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Electric power filter time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0

tw1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. First WashOut (T).  Typical Value = 3.5. Default: 0

tw2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Second WashOut (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

vsmn.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Stabilizer output max limit (V).  Typical Value = -0.1. Default: 0.0

vsmx.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Stabilizer output min limit (V).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0
